agenda_items.title:
AGENDA 
CITY COUNCIL 
SPECIAL CALLED MEETING
TUESDAY, AUGUST 23, 2022


The City Council meeting will be held by videoconference and in the Council Chambers, 6th Floor at City Hall.    Individuals who wish to speak in accordance with the City Council Rules of Procedure must sign up with the City Secretaryâ€™s Office.  

The public is encouraged to attend the meeting virtually; however, City Hall is available for those wishing to attend the meeting in person following all current pandemic-related public health protocols. 

The following videoconference link is available to the public to listen to the meeting and Public Affairs and Outreach will also stream the City Council meeting on Spectrum Cable Channel 16 and bit.ly/cityofdallastv:

Personnel (Sec. 551.074 T.O.M.A.)
- Discussion regarding performance review and evaluation of City Manager T.C. Broadnax.
- Discussion regarding performance review and evaluation of City Attorney Chris Caso.
- Discussion regarding performance review and evaluation of City Secretary Bilierae Johnson.
- Discussion regarding performance review and evaluation of City Auditor Mark Swann.

- Discuss, consider, and take all appropriate actions pursuant to the performance review and evaluation of City Manager T.C. Broadnax. 22-1172; APPROVED
- Discuss, consider, and take all appropriate actions pursuant to the performance review and evaluation of City Attorney Chris Caso. 22-1273; DEFERRED UNTIL JANUARY 30, 2023
- Discuss, consider, and take all appropriate actions pursuant to the performance review and evaluation of City Secretary Bilirae Johnson. 22-1174; APPROVED
- Discuss, consider, and take all appropriate actions pursuant to the performance review and evaluation of City Auditor Mark Swann. 22-1175; APPROVED
